_comment: Slow configuration with arithmetic crossover and block mutation
_comment_profile: Thorough exploration with sophisticated blending - arithmetic crossover explores intermediate solutions through weighted combinations while block mutation investigates correlated feature groups

_comment_crossover_descriptions.arithmetic: Arithmetic crossover - arithmetic combination using alpha parameter

_comment_mutation_descriptions.block: Contiguous block of bits flipped together (size controlled by block_size)

_comment_parameters.uniform_swap_prob: Used with uniform crossover - probability of swapping each gene
_comment_parameters.arithmetic_alpha: Used with arithmetic crossover - weight factor (0 < alpha < 1) - set to 0.7 for asymmetric blending favoring first parent
_comment_parameters.block_size: Used with block mutation - size of contiguous block to mutate (increased to 5 for exploring larger feature groups)
_comment_parameters.adaptive_min_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - minimum mutation probability
_comment_parameters.adaptive_max_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - maximum mutation probability

_comment_performance_notes.population_size: Large population for extensive exploration and diversity maintenance
_comment_performance_notes.generations: Many generations for thorough convergence and fine-tuning
_comment_performance_notes.crossover_prob: Very high crossover probability to maximize arithmetic blending benefits
_comment_performance_notes.mutation_prob: Very low base mutation rate to complement larger block sizes
_comment_performance_notes.block_exploration: Large block size of 5 allows deep exploration of feature dependencies and correlations
_comment_performance_notes.arithmetic_focus: Asymmetric alpha (0.7) creates biased blending that preserves good parent characteristics while exploring variations
